lyrics:
10 contributorstake it to the edge lyricsverse 1
driving my fist down deep inside it
oh yeah gonna take it to a whole new level
in spite of your bullshit baby
tasting sweet anxiety
breaking through another day
maybe i just dont care anymore
what you think of me

chorus
ill take it to the edge
ill take it to the other side
i hear it screaming
its coming alive
ill take it to the edge
ill take it to the other side
i feel it breathing
deep down inside
deep down inside

verse 2
tearing through shards of broken glass
oh yeah getting one step closer to the edge
and taking it all back baby
surging through my blackened veins
uncontrolled in a different way
i cant wait to get away
from everything
see godsmack liveget tickets as low as 46you might also likechorus
ill take it to the edge
ill take it to the other side
i hear it screaming
its coming alive
ill take it to the edge
ill take it to the other side
i feel it breathing
deep down inside

bridge
oh yeah oh yeah
all right all right
i feel it comin alive
yeah
oh yeah oh yeah
all right all right
im breakin on through the other side

chorus
ill take it to the edge
ill take it to the other side
i hear it screaming
its coming alive
ill take it to the edge
ill take it to the other side
i feel it breathing
deep down inside
outro
ill take it to the edge of life all right
ill take it to the edge of life im so alive
ill take it to the edge of life all right
ill take it to the edge of life all rightembed
